results.title: Simvastatin suppresses RANTES-mediated neutrophilia in polyinosinic-polycytidylic acid-induced pneumonia.

results.title: Inhibition of HMGCoA reductase by simvastatin protects mice from injurious mechanical ventilation
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Leukocytosis @DISEASE_MESH:D007964 @@@Lavage pleocytosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Neutrophilia_Hereditary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563010 @@@neutrophilia@@@ were induced by HVt but were significantly attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
